Consider the following statements about the Robot Sophia
  1. It is world’s first AI powered humanoid robot.
  2. It is world's first robot citizen. Saudi Gave citizenship to Sophia.
  3. Sophia was named the United Nations Development Programme's first ever Innovation Champion
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sophia is a humanoid robot developed by Hong Kong-based company Hanson Robotics. Sophia was granted Saudi Arabian citizenship, becoming the first robot ever to have a nationality. In November 2017, Sophia was named the United Nations Development Programme\'s first ever Innovation Champion. Sophia was the first non-human to be given any United Nations title. [Source]
